title: IVG Air 4 in 1 Prefilled Pods
description: IVG Air 4 in 1 Replacement Pods The IVG Air 4 in 1 replacement pods are a pack of 2 pods that have each been prefilled with 2ml of nicotine salt vape juice in a 20mg nicotine strength. These pods are perfect for those who enjoy mouth to lung style vaping or who are looking for a simple and straightforward vaping experience, as they donâ€™t need to be refilled. When a pod has run out of e-liquid , simply remove it and replace it with a new one! Each 2ml pod is capable of lasting for up to 600 puffs, so one pack can offer up to a total of 1200 puffs. However, the amount of puffs that you receive can vary depending on the length of each inhale; those who take shorter puffs will find that their pods last for longer than those who enjoy longer inhales. Key Features Sold as a pack of 2 prefilled pods Compatible with the IVG Air 2 in 1 and IVG Air 4 in 1 Prefilled Pod Vape Each pod contains 2ml of flavoured nicotine salt vape juice Features a 20mg nicotine strength Pre-filled pods are available in 27 different flavours Suitable for MTL vaping (mouth to lung) Pods can last for up to 600 puffs each for a total of up to 1200 puffs per pack. IVG Air Pods Flavour List A list of all IVG Air 4 in 1 flavours; with more than 25 different IVG Air flavours available for you to choose from! Each pack features 2 pods that have been prefilled with the same flavour. Blackcurrant Apple - Juicy blackcurrant with crisp apple. Blue Raspberry Cherry - Sweet blue raspberries with a slightly sour red cherry. Blue Raspberry Ice - Tangy blue raspberry with an ice-cold cooling sensation. Blue Razz Plum - Tart blue raspberries with a side of sweet and punchy plum. Blue Sour Raspberry - Sweet yet slightly sour blue raspberries. Classic Menthol - A classic cool menthol with a clean, crisp flavour. Fizzy Cherry - Rich red cherries with a fun little fizz. Fizzy Cola - Sweet sparkling cola, freshly poured for the perfect puff. Fizzy Lemon - Light and zesty lemon with a slight fizz. Fizzy Orange - Sweet and citrusy orange with a bright fizzy twist. Grape Ice - Mouth watering medley of grapes with a blast of cool ice. Kiwi Pineapple - A feisty kiwi flavour with a side of punchy tropical pineapple. Lemon Cherry Ice - Lush lemon with charming cherry undertones and a touch of ice. Lemon Cherry Passion Fruit - A tasty trio featuring sweet passion fruit with slightly sour lemon and delicate cherry undertones. Lemon Lime - Classic combination of zingy lemon with sweet and sharp limes. Mango Pineapple - Exotic mouth watering mango mixed with a pop of pineapple. Peach Mango Ice - Soft and fruity peach with moreish mango overtones and a touch of ice. Pineapple Ice - A potent pineapple flavour paired with a blast of arctic ice. Pineapple Passion Fruit - Notes of sweet and tangy passion fruit paired with a juicy pineapple base. Strawberry Ice - Fresh, sweet strawberries followed by a flash of cool frostiness. Tropical Fruits - A vibrant blend of tropical fruits for a lively, fun flavour. Watermelon Ice - Refreshing watermelon notes with an exhilarating ice-cold exhale. Watermelon Lemon - A flavour that stimulates the senses with uplifting watermelon notes combined with a lively lemon base. Watermelon Lychee - An adventurous yet aromatic blend of juicy watermelon with a luscious lychee. Package Contains: 2x IVG Air 4 in 1 Prefilled Replacement Pods (1 Pack)
